H0.text: Snakes are the organisms that contribute most to the decomposition of dead organisms.

H1.text: Viruses are the organisms that contribute most to the decomposition of dead organisms.

H2.text: Insects contribute most to the decomposition of dead organisms.

H3.text: Bacteria contribute most to the decomposition of dead organisms.

A4.text: Fungi are the primary decomposers in many ecosystems.

A5.text: Only wood-decay fungi have evolved lignin-modifying enzymes necessary to decompose lignin.

A6.text: The nutrient cycle includes the decomposition of dead bodies; bacteria are responsible for the putrefaction stage in this process.
